projects.title: World of Orchids
projects.caption: Non-profit
projects.description: This is an information site for a fictional non-profit organization inspired by the American Orchid Society. Built with HTML, CSS and JS, it features responsive design and scroll-reveal.js.

projects.title: L'Mau
projects.caption: Fashion forward feline shopping site
projects.description: This is a full stack e-commerce shopping site created with React, REST API architecture, data management with mongoose and MongoDB, state management with Redux. Styled with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Chanel
projects.caption: Landing Page
projects.description: This is a landing page for Chanel perfume built with HTML, CSS and Lightbox.js. It features responsive design and a css grid image gallery.

projects.title: Omakase
projects.caption: Restaurant Homepage
projects.description: Inspired by my love for anything sushi, this project is a fully responsive website created with HTML and styled with Material Design for Bootstrap and custom css.

projects.title: iFlix
projects.caption: Movie Web API
projects.description: This is a full stack movie web application using server-side REST API architecture with Node/Express, data management with mongoose and MongoDB Atlas, client-side interface with REACT, styled with React Bootstrap. {testUser: cat, password: cat}

projects.title: Pokédex
projects.caption: Gen 1. Pokémon Database
projects.description: Recreating a fond childhood memory, I built this app with React and data from the PokéAPI. Click on a Pokémon card to see a detailed page with data, sprites, evolutions, moves and more! Gotta Catch 'Em All!

projects.title: Folia
projects.caption: Online PLant Shop
projects.description: I'm not allowed to buy anymore houseplants so I created this MERN e-commerce site as my plant fix (for now). It features login authentication, user/order/product management and also payment methods with PayPal.

projects.title: Meetup
projects.caption: Find events in your city!
projects.description: This serverless, progressive web app is built with React, implementing test driven development. I use AWS Lambda as the serverless compute service as well as the MeetupAPI to fetch upcoming events for a selected city.

projects.title: Moose Y. Lee
projects.caption: Portfolio
projects.description: I've created at least 7 versions of my portfolio website was never quite satisfied with the results. So I created yet another one but this time I made it for a 'friend'. It is a fully responsive website with HTML, CSS and JS
